name: bdhack

scripts.start: nodemon --exec 'browserify src/index.js -o build/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] && node server.js' --ignore node_modules --ignore build
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o build/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]

author: Derek Li, Stephen Laboucane, Wenhao Zhang
